content: at heel opening is facing you join yarn in center st of heel opening on cuff side work 28 single_crochet evenly around opening working 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet and chain plus an extra single_crochet at each inner corner of heel opening join with sl st 28 single_crochet mark extra side stitch at each side of heel opening with removable markers hairpin or safety pin so that there are 13 sts between each marker as you work the following rounds keep markers in same location on sides of heel but move them up each round as you work decrease round chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet single_crochet to 2 sts before marker single_crochet next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in marked st remove & replace marker up to current round single_crochet next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet to 2 sts before next marker single_crochet next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in marked st remove & replace marker up to current round single_crochet next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet to end of round join with slip_stitch 24 single_crochet work 1 round even 24 single_crochet 2 next decrease round chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet single_crochet to 2 sts before next marker single_crochet next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in marked st single_crochet next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet to 2 sts before next marker single_crochet next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in marked st single_crochet next 2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet to end of round join with slip_stitch 20 single_crochet repeat last decrease round 3 times 16 12 8 cut yarn thread into tapestry needle gather sts to close toe weave in ends optional trim sock can be worn as is with cuff pulled up or top of cuff can be turned down for rolled cuff or decorative trim can be added as follows plain trim with contrast color join yarn at center back of cuff edge you will be working on the opposite side of beginning chain round chain 1 single_crochet loosely in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch 24 single_crochet work one or more rounds single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends for ruffled trim row 1 with contrast color join yarn at center back of cuff edge you will be working on the opposite side of beginning chain round chain 1 single_crochet loosely in ea chain around join with slip_stitch 24 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet *chain 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends
